ref.Programmability.Name: StateProgram_CaptionDocumentRegistratorSubProgram
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand:
CREATE FUNCTION doc.StateProgram_CaptionDocumentRegistratorSubProgram( @idDoc int, -- идентификатор документа (idOwner из ТЧ) @idSBP int, -- ТЧ.Ответственный исполнитель @idDocType int, -- тут может быть null, если нужно взять из документа @idSystemGoal int -- ТЧ.Основная цель ) RETURNS nvarchar(max) AS BEGIN DECLARE @res nvarchar(max)
;
WITH hier AS ( SELECT id, idParent FROM doc.StateProgram WHERE id = @idDoc
UNION ALL
SELECT d.id, d.idParent FROM hier AS r INNER JOIN doc.StateProgram AS d ON d.id = r.idParent )
SELECT TOP 1 @res = dbo.GetCaption(rap.idRegistratorEntity, rap.idRegistrator) FROM doc.StateProgram AS d INNER JOIN reg.Program AS rp ON rp.idVersion = d.idVersion AND rp.idDocType = @idDocType AND ISNULL(rp.idSBP,0) = ISNULL(@idSBP,0) INNER JOIN reg.AttributeOfProgram AS rap ON rap.idProgram = rp.id INNER JOIN reg.SystemGoalElement AS rsge ON rsge.id = rap.idGoalSystemElement INNER JOIN reg.Program AS rp_prnt ON rp_prnt.id = rap.idParent WHERE d.id = @idDoc AND rap.idTerminator IS NULL AND rsge.idSystemGoal = @idSystemGoal AND rp_prnt.idRegistratorEntity = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM ref.Entity AS e WHERE e.Name = 'StateProgram') AND rp_prnt.idRegistrator = (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM hier WHERE idParent IS NULL AND id != @idDoc)
RETURN @res END
